text: Marc Labelle (born December 20, 1969) was an NHL hockey player for the Dallas Stars. He played from 1996-1997. He also played for the El Paso Buzzards in the WPHL league. He was born in Maniwaki, Canada and is 44 years old. He shoots left handed. He went undrafted and signed by the Montreal Canadiens in 1991. He wore number 27 jersey for the Dallas Stars. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian ice hockey left wingers Category:Colonial Hockey League players Category:Dallas Stars players Category:ECHL players Category:Fredericton Canadiens players Category:Hull Olympiques players Category:Ice hockey people from Quebec Category:International Hockey League (1945â€“2001) players Category:New Haven Senators players Category:Victoriaville Tigres players
